# thunder_chassis_info (Resource)

`thunder_chassis_info`: Info regarding the chassis state

__PLACEHOLDER__

## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "thunder" {
  address  = var.dut9049
  username = var.username
  password = var.password
}
resource "thunder_chassis_info" "thunder_chassis_info" {
  brief = 0
}
```
